title: Women In The Workforce
text: package allows exploration data related women gives user ability view manipulate data depending key takeaways wish . package also provides relative ease access readability form visualizations can found inbuilt shiny app. skips entire process wrangling plotting visualizations user can straightaway analyze data easiest form, ‘visualization’. visualizations also additional advantage interactive allowing users subset plot liking.

title: Women In The Workforce
text: first dataset “earnings_female”, variable ‘group’ changed ‘Age_Group’ make sense. final data dictionary can seen : second dataset “employed_gender”, variables selected interest. Next, variables ‘full_time_female’, ‘full_time_male’, ‘part_time_female’, ‘part_time_male’ pivoted new variable called ‘Job_Type’ respective values another new variable called ‘Percentage’. final data dictionary can seen : third dataset “jobs_gender”, variables selected interest. Next, variables ‘workers_female’, ‘workers_male’ pivoted new variable called ‘Gender’ respective values another new variable called ‘Workforce’. final data dictionary can seen : fourth dataset “jobs_earnings”, first required columns selected “jobs_gender” dataframe. gender columns pivoted one new column called ‘Gender’ values creating ‘Earnings’. final data dictionary can seen : fifth dataset “jobs_workforce”, first required columns selected “jobs_gender” dataframe. gender columns pivoted one new column called ‘Gender’ values creating ‘Workforce’. final data dictionary can seen : dataframes found package related data follows: earnings_female() - Returns tibble earnings females various age groups shown year-wise. employed_gender() - Returns tibble employment rate genders regarding full-time part-time job types shown year-wise. jobs_earnings() - Returns tibble earnings genders based occupation shown year-wise. jobs_gender() - Returns tibble earnings workforce categorized gender based variable based occupation, shown year-wise. jobs_workforce() - Returns tibble total number workforce present occupation based genders, shown year-wise. function package solve quadratic equation follows: quadratic() - Takes three inputs coefficients quadratic function returns roots said function depending type roots available, determined calculating discriminant. function package launch inbuilt shiny app follows: run_app() - Triggers inbuilt shiny app displays various plots insights women fare workplace especially men. function package plot graph based inputs interactive elements shiny app follows: earningsplot() - Displays line chart entered age group females 1979 2011. age_groups - Returns vector displaying available age groups present female earnings dataset aid user entering valid age groups earnnigsplot function.

title: Women In The Workforce

A tibble: 6 × 3 #>    year Job_Type         Percentage #>   <dbl> <chr>                 <dbl> #> 1  1968 full_time_female       75.1 #> 2  1968 part_time_female       24.9 #> 3  1968 full_time_male         92.2 #> 4  1968 part_time_male          7.8 #> 5  1969 full_time_female       74.9 #> 6  1969 part_time_female       25.1 head(jobs_earnings) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>    year occupation                      minor_category Gender Earnings #>   <dbl> <chr>                           <chr>          <chr>     <dbl> #> 1  2013 Chief executives                Management     Male     126142 #> 2  2013 Chief executives                Management     Female    95921 #> 3  2013 General and operations managers Management     Male      81041 #> 4  2013 General and operations managers Management     Female    60759 #> 5  2013 Legislators                     Management     Male      71530 #> 6  2013 Legislators                     Management     Female    65325 head(jobs_gender,4) #> # A tibble: 4 × 12 #>    year occupation      major_category minor_category total_workers workers_male #>   <dbl> <chr>           <chr>          <chr>                  <dbl>        <dbl> #> 1  2013 Chief executiv… Management, B… Management           1024259       782400 #> 2  2013 General and op… Management, B… Management            977284       681627 #> 3  2013 Legislators     Management, B… Management             14815         8375 #> 4  2013 Advertising an… Management, B… Management             43015        17775 #> # ℹ 6 more variables: workers_female <dbl>, percent_female <dbl>, #> #   total_earnings <dbl>, total_earnings_male <dbl>, #> #   total_earnings_female <dbl>, wage_percent_of_male <dbl> head(jobs_workforce) #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>    year occupation                      minor_category Gender Workforce #>   <dbl> <chr>                           <chr>          <chr>      <dbl> #> 1  2013 Chief executives                Management     Male      782400 #> 2  2013 Chief executives                Management     Female    241859 #> 3  2013 General and operations managers Management     Male      681627 #> 4  2013 General and operations managers Management     Female    295657 #> 5  2013 Legislators                     Management     Male        8375 #> 6  2013 Legislators                     Management     Female      6440 quadratic(1,5,6) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   Roots Root_Type       #>   <dbl> <chr>           #> 1    -2 Real & Distinct #> 2    -3 Real & Distinct  quadratic(1,-6,9) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   Roots Root_Type       #>   <dbl> <chr>           #> 1     3 Real & Repeated #> 2     3 Real & Repeated  quadratic(5,2,1) #> # text: Mahtolia S (2023). WomInWorkShiny: Runs Interactive Shiny App Along Quadratic Function. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {WomInWorkShiny: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function},   author = {Shreyansh Mahtolia},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function
title: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function
text: goal WomInWorkShiny package allow users explore data regarding women fare workplace men terms earnings, employment rate amount workforce present. data recorded country US various years provided tidytuesday repository GitHub. package contains tibbles factors taken account comparison two genders total female earnings, employment rate job type, workforce earnings occupation genders. package also contains function find roots quadratic equation return depending type roots discovered calculating discriminant. package also consists graphical function displays line chart depending age group entered user. help user enter valid age groups previous function, package also consists vector available age groups help user enter choice return line chart output. Finally, package contains function launch inbuilt shiny app showcase ‘Women Workplace’ can help users gain insights data via visualizations well interact .

title: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function
text: One can install package following GitHub link: WomInWorkShiny R:

title: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function
text: following code can used load package: following code allows user look inside earnings dataset: following function returns roots quadratic equation: following function launches inbuilt shiny app titled ‘Women Workplace’: following function displays line plot female earnings throughout years based age group entered user: following vector consists available age groups female earnings dataset aid user entering valid age group:
code: library(WomInWorkShiny) head(earnings_female) # A tibble: 6 × 3    Year Age_Group                 percent   <dbl> <chr>                       <dbl> 1  1979 Total, 16 years and older    62.3 2  1980 Total, 16 years and older    64.2 3  1981 Total, 16 years and older    64.4 4  1982 Total, 16 years and older    65.7 5  1983 Total, 16 years and older    66.5 6  1984 Total, 16 years and older    67.6 quadratic(1,5,6) # A tibble: 2 × 2   Roots Root_Type         <dbl> <chr>           1    -2 Real & Distinct 2    -3 Real & Distinct run_app() earningsplot("16-19 years") age_groups [1] "Total, 16 years and older" "16-19 years"               "20-24 years"               "25-34 years"               [5] "35-44 years"               "45-54 years"               "55-64 years"               "65 years and older"

what: Roots of A Quadratic Equation — quadratic
title: Roots of A Quadratic Equation — quadratic
text: Calculates roots quadratic equation returns either 2 distinct real roots, 1 repeated real root, 2 imaginary roots depending discriminant calculated. order roots entered important input variable corresponds coefficient simple quadratic equation. values ,b,c coefficients equation follow nomenclature ax^2 + bx + c !=0.

title: Roots of A Quadratic Equation — quadratic
Roots of A Quadratic Equation — quadratic
text: real numeric coefficient b real numeric coefficient c real numeric coefficient

title: Roots of A Quadratic Equation — quadratic
text: tibble consisting 2 variables, Roots Root_Type

title: Roots of A Quadratic Equation — quadratic
code: quadratic(1,5,6) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   Roots Root_Type       #>   <dbl> <chr>           #> 1    -2 Real & Distinct #> 2    -3 Real & Distinct quadratic(1,-6,9) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   Roots Root_Type       #>   <dbl> <chr>           #> 1     3 Real & Repeated #> 2     3 Real & Repeated quadratic(5,2,1) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   Roots     Root_Type #>   <cpl>     <chr>     #> 1 -0.2+0.4i Imaginary #> 2 -0.2-0.4i Imaginary

title: Shiny App — run_app
text: Launches Shiny App Project, Women Workplace user able gain insights women perform workplace respect earnings, employment rate, various job categories factored . also shows stack men comparison whether gender discrimination prevalent . app also allows user interact visualizations filter plots depending inputs selected.

title: Shiny App — run_app
Shiny App — run_app

what: WomInWorkShiny: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function — WomInWorkShiny-package
title: WomInWorkShiny: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function — WomInWorkShiny-package
text: Allows user explore various datasets related women's earnings, overall employment rate, employment rate job category. also launches inbuilt Shiny app visualize interact plots gain valuable insights. also function find roots quadratic equation depending discriminant calculated.

title: WomInWorkShiny: Runs An Interactive Shiny App Along With A Quadratic Function — WomInWorkShiny-package
